hypothesis_content.title: MiCA Implementation Sell-the-News Reversion to Bear
hypothesis_content.statement: Within 10 trading days following formal MiCA implementation announcements, any rally exceeding 8% from announcement date highs will fully retrace to pre-announcement levels as regulatory clarity gets priced in, triggering NEUTRAL-to-BEAR transition when VIX term structure inverts.
hypothesis_content.rationale: MiCA has been anticipated for years - implementation represents 'sell the news' event. Combined with overbought conditions and traditional market stress (VIX inversion), creates high-probability mean reversion.
entry_conditions: Official MiCA implementation date announced by EU authorities
BTC rallies 8%+ from announcement day's high within 10 trading days
CBOE VIX term structure inverts (VIX1M > VIX3M)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Full retrace to pre-announcement price level ±1.5%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC establishes new 30-day high >5% above entry price

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC sustains >5% above announcement highs for 7+ days post-implementation OR crypto-specific volatility (CVOL) remains below traditional market volatility (VIX).
